name: Aghori Baba
description: The Aghori are a small group of ascetic Shaiva sadhus based in India. They engage in post-mortem rituals. They often dwell in charnel grounds, smear cremation ashes on their bodies, and use bones from human corpses for crafting kapalas and jewellery. heir practices are sometimes considered contradictory to orthodox Hinduism. Many Aghori gurus command great reverence from rural populations, as they are supposed to possess healing powers gained through their intensely eremitic rites and practices of renunciation and tápasya.
